# Privacy Policy

Last updated: December 1, 2024

Intrusive Memory Productions ("we," "us," or "our") operates Produciesta (the "App"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our App. ## Information We Collect ### Information You Provide - **Account Information**: If you create an account, we may collect your email address for support communications. - **Support Requests**: When you contact us for support, we collect the information you provide in your request. ### Information Collected Automatically - **Analytics Data**: We use TelemetryDeck for anonymous analytics. This includes: - Anonymous session identifiers (not linked to your identity) - App version and operating system - General device type (iPhone, iPad, Mac) - Feature usage patterns (anonymized) - Crash reports (anonymized) **Important**: TelemetryDeck does not collect personally identifiable information. Analytics data cannot be used to identify you. ### Information We Do NOT Collect - **Your Screenplays**: Your creative content stays on your device. We never upload, store, or access your screenplays. - **Audio Generations**: Generated audio files are created locally or via direct API calls to voice services. We do not store or access this content. - **API Keys**: If you use the BYOK feature, your ElevenLabs API key is stored locally on your device and never transmitted to our servers. ## How We Use Your Information We use collected information to: - Improve the App's features and performance - Understand how users interact with the App - Identify and fix bugs and crashes - Respond to support requests - Comply with legal obligations ## Data Sharing We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with: - **Service Providers**: We use TelemetryDeck for analytics. They process data according to their privacy policy. - **Voice Services**: When generating audio, your dialogue text is sent directly to the voice service (built-in or ElevenLabs). This is necessary for the App to function. - **Legal Requirements**: We may disclose information if required by law or to protect our rights. ## Third-Party Services ### TelemetryDeck (Analytics) We use TelemetryDeck for privacy-respecting analytics. TelemetryDeck: - Does not use cookies - Does not collect IP addresses - Does not track users across apps - Is GDPR compliant Learn more: [telemetrydeck.com/privacy](https://telemetrydeck.com/privacy) ### ElevenLabs (Voice Generation - Pro BYOK) If you connect your own ElevenLabs API key: - Text is sent directly to ElevenLabs for voice generation - This connection is between your device and ElevenLabs - ElevenLabs' privacy policy applies to this data Learn more: [elevenlabs.io/privacy](https://elevenlabs.io/privacy) ## Data Retention - **Analytics Data**: Aggregated analytics are retained for up to 24 months. - **Support Communications**: Retained as long as needed to resolve your request, then deleted. - **Local Data**: Your screenplays and generated audio are stored only on your device. Deleting the App removes this data. ## Your Rights ### For All Users You have the right to: - Access information we have about you - Request deletion of your information - Opt out of analytics (via App settings) - Contact us with privacy questions ### For California Residents (CCPA) You have additional rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act: - Right to know what personal information is collected - Right to delete personal information - Right to opt-out of the sale of personal information (we do not sell data) - Right to non-discrimination for exercising your rights ### For European Users (GDPR) You have additional rights under the General Data Protection Regulation: - Right to access your data - Right to rectification - Right to erasure - Right to restrict processing - Right to data portability - Right to object to processing ## Children's Privacy Produciesta is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect information from children under 13. If you believe we have collected such information, please contact us. ## Data Security We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure. ## International Data Transfers If you use the App outside the United States, your information may be transferred to and processed in the United States, where data protection laws may differ from your country. ## Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of changes by: - Posting the new policy on this page - Updating the "Last updated" date - Notifying you in the App for significant changes ## Contact Us For privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights: **Email**: support@produciesta.app **Mail**: Intrusive Memory Productions Privacy Requests [Address] We will respond to your request within 30 days.

Transform your screenplays into audio productions with AI-powered voices.
